00021 #include <iostream>
00022 #include <highgui.h>
00023 #include "pyrimage.h"
00024 
00025 using namespace std;
00026 
00027 PyrImage::PyrImage(IplImage *im, int nblev) : nbLev(nblev)
00028 {
00029   images = new IplImage *[nblev];
00030 
00031   images[0] = im;
00032 
00033   for (int i=1; i<nbLev; ++i) {
00034     images[i] = cvCreateImage(cvSize(images[i-1]->width/2, images[i-1]->height/2),
00035                               im->depth, im->nChannels);
00036   }
00037 }
00038 
00039 PyrImage::~PyrImage() {
00040   for (int i=0; i<nbLev; ++i) 
00041     cvReleaseImage(&images[i]);
00042   delete [] images;
00043 }
00044 
00045 void PyrImage::build()
00046 {
00047   for (int i=1; i<nbLev; ++i) 
00048     cvPyrDown(images[i-1], images[i]);
00049 }
00050 
00051 PyrImage *PyrImage::load(int level, const char *filename, int color, bool fatal) {
00052 
00053   IplImage *im = cvLoadImage(filename, color);
00054 
00055   if (im == 0) {
00056     cerr << filename << ": unable to load image.\n";
00057     if (fatal)
00058       exit(-1);
00059     return 0;
00060   }
00061 
00062   PyrImage *r= new PyrImage(im, level);
00063   r->build();
00064   return r;
00065 }
00066 
00067 int PyrImage::convCoord(int x, int from, int to, unsigned max)
00068 {
00069   if (max == 2) 
00070     return (convCoord(x, from, to, 0) + convCoord(x, from, to, 1)) >> 1;
00071   if (to==from) 
00072     return x;
00073   if (to<from) {
00074     if (max == 1) {
00075       int r=x;
00076       for (int i=from; i<to; ++i) {
00077         r = r*2 + 1;
00078       }
00079       return r;
00080     } 
00081     return x << ( from - to );
00082   }
00083   return x >> ( to - from );
00084 }
00085 
00086 float PyrImage::convCoordf(float x, int from, int to)
00087 {
00088   if (to == from) 
00089     return x;
00090 
00091   if (to<from) 
00092     return x * float(1 << (from-to));
00093 
00094   return x / float(1 << (to-from)); 
00095 }
00096 
00097 void PyrImage::setPixel(unsigned x, unsigned y, CvScalar &val)
00098 {
00099   if (( x >= (unsigned)images[0]->width ) || ( y >= (unsigned)images[0]->height ))
00100     return;
00101 
00102   for (int i=0; i<nbLev; ++i) {
00103     cvSet2D(images[i], 
00104       convCoord((int)y, 0, i),
00105       convCoord((int)x, 0, i),
00106       val);
00107   }
00108 }
00109 
00110 void PyrImage::set(CvScalar val)
00111 {
00112   for (int i=0; i<nbLev; ++i)
00113     cvSet(images[i], val);
00114 }
00115 
00116 PyrImage *PyrImage::clone() const
00117 {
00118   PyrImage *p = new PyrImage(cvCloneImage(images[0]), nbLev);
00119   for (int i=1; i<nbLev; ++i)
00120     cvCopy(images[i], p->images[i]);
00121   return p;
00122 }
00123 
00124 void PyrImage::setImageROI(CvRect rect) 
00125 {
00126   CvRect r;
00127   for (int i=0; i<nbLev; ++i) {
00128     r.x = convCoord(rect.x, 0, i);
00129     r.y = convCoord(rect.y, 0, i);
00130     r.width = convCoord(rect.width, 0, i);
00131     r.height = convCoord(rect.height, 0, i);
00132     cvSetImageROI(images[i], r);
00133   }
00134 }
00135 
00136 void PyrImage::resetImageROI()
00137 {
00138   for (int i=0; i<nbLev; ++i) {
00139     cvResetImageROI(images[i]);
00140   }
00141 }
